testcase.name: To get the value of property using json path expression
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://dummyjson.com' ......................................... passed Given path '/products' .................................................... passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * def title = karate.jsonPath(response, "$.products[:1].title") ........... passed * def description = karate.jsonPath(response, "$.products[:1].description") . passed * def price = karate.jsonPath(response, "$.products[:1].price") ........... passed And print "title ==>" , title ............................................. passed And print "description ==>" , description ................................. passed And print "price ==>" , price ............................................. passed
